items.sentence: Stop beating around the bush and tell us what you really think.
I guess I\'m wasting my time trying to convince Tom to help us.
It\'s unlikely that replacing the battery will fix the problem.
Let\'s go drink a cup of coffee at that coffee shop over there.
I suspect that Tom doesn\'t really enjoy doing that by himself.
I think Tom is the only one here who doesn\'t know how to swim.
If you don\'t want to do it yourself, you can ask Tom to do it.
Of all the countries I\'ve visited, I liked Australia the best.
We spend too much time talking about things that don\'t matter.
We\'ll use the house as collateral so we can borrow some money.
